name: socketio-library-and-chat
description: A simple library with chat client using socket.io
author: Grant Timmerman

scripts.dev: npm run start:network && npm run start:redis && npm run start:instance1 && npm run start:instance2
scripts.stop: npm run stop:redis && npm run stop:instance1 && npm run stop:instance2 && npm run stop:network
scripts.stop:redis: docker stop redis && docker rm redis
scripts.stop:instance1: docker stop library1 && docker rm library1
scripts.stop:instance2: docker stop library2 && docker rm library2
